alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 11:27AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nye County through NOON PDT... At 1126 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles west of Round Mountain. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail along with very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Nye County. Water from this thunderstorm may drain into the Reese River Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
